page.title: 19Steam Rally,Near Pimperne.
page.content: For weeks each September the roads round Pimperne are jammed by steam rollers,steam engines, ancient farm machinery, trailers and caravans.The Stourpaine Bushes Great Working of Steam is about to take place, an event very reminiscent of the old country fair.Not only can one see farm machinery powered by steam but country crafts,hurdle making,cheese and cider making,wood and metal work,thatching. The cacophony of sound of steam organs,the rhythm of engines,the magnificent sight of shire horses, the a acrid smell of smoke and oil go to make an unforgettable experience.One is thrilled by the explosion of sound from the fairground,seduced by the insistent calls of stall holders, intoxicated by the macabre anticipation of the ghost train.A day to remember.
